get_hist_of_religion = function(religion) {
  protestantism.value =  sum(religion * religions.data$population * happiness.data$happiness_score) / sum(religions.data$population * religion)

  # religions.data$protestant_percent

  protestantism.num.of.people = religion * religions.data$population
  protestantism.people.score = happiness.data$happiness_score

  # protestantism.num.of.people
  # protestantism.people.score

  print(protestantism.value)

  plot(protestantism.people.score, protestantism.num.of.people)

  f = function(value, count, arr) {
    for (i in seq(count)) {
      arr = c(arr, value)
    
    }
    arr 
  }

  arr = c()
  for (i in protestantism.people.score) {
    for (j in protestantism.num.of.people) {
      arr = c(arr, i)
    }
  }
  
  hist(arr)
}

# religion = religions.data$noreligion_percent
